Name: Prince of Wales Punch
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: MUDDLE pineapple in base of shaker. Add next five ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. Float the port on drink.
Review: Fruity yet complex with the oak maturation of both spirits and liqueurs adding depth of flavour.
History: Adapted from Jerry Thomas' 1862 The Bar-Tender's Guide (How to Mix Drinks, The Bon-Vivant's Companion) .
